chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st Degree Sexual Assault)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Steven Z. Brubaker was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st Degree Sexual Assault), a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.025(1)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Defendant is ordered to pay the $250.00 DNA surcharge, provide a sample for testing through the Dept. of Corrections as required in felony convictions.  Bond applied.

Defendant shall attend counseling, treatments, programming, evaluations as deemed appropriate by the agent releasing all records to the agent upon request
Defendant to undergo a psychological evaluation  at a facility approved by the agent, follow all recommendations  and release all records to the agent
Defendant is to undergo a sex offender evaluation at a facility approved by the agent, follow recommendations and release all records to the agent.

Defendant is not to on or around the premises of W7724 Center Road, Thorp WI. 
Defendant is not to have contact with anyone under the age of 18 beyond incidental, unless approved by the agent and the agent determines if it is supervised or not.
Defendant is not use, view or possess pornographic materials.

The defendant shall pay Department of Correction fees as directed by the agent.
Defendant is to comply with the Sex Offender Registry requirements and follow all rules.

timeConds.notes: Jail sentence to start immediately.  Huber granted after the defendant serves his first 30 days without huber.
